Description: Exact column name in the data file.
Clear definition of the column's meaning.
TRUE if the column is required for each row

column6: UCUM/QUDT). Required for measurement columns; also used as the unit component for I-ADOPT-style variable descriptions.

Description: IRI for the ontology term that represents what this column measures or represents. Required for measurement columns; use a SKOS concept when the column is a compound variable.

column8: skos_concept). Helps validators understand how to interpret the term_iri.

Description: I-ADOPT property IRI (what is being measured
column8:
rate). Required for measurement columns.
entity_iri,string,no,optional,I-ADOPT object-of-interest/entity IRI (what the measurement is about). Required for measurement columns.
constraint_iri,string,no,optional,I-ADOPT constraint IRI(s) (life stage, origin"
column11:
separate IRIs with ';' in a single cell. Optional.
method_iri,string,no,optional,Procedure/method IRI (aligns to SOSA sosa:Procedure; SOSA is the W3C/OGC observations vocabulary). Optional; fill when known.
